name: Meathead's Word Within Words-TRI Online Trivia | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Ok, here is how it works.  I will give you a clue.  It will consist of TRI plus another word, which combine to make a new word.  Example:
TRI + an arthritis fighting drug = something given to show respect
The answer is tribute!

Ok, you TRI!

TRI + measurement using degrees = three sided figure
TRI + nickname for a type of shoe = like the council in "Survivor"
questions.explanation:
Tribal.

	The full term for the type of shoe is a "balmoral," but it can also be called a "bal" for short.

questions.text: TRI + Phosphorus = To stumble, or a journey
TRI + the main point = a type of lens for your glasses
questions.explanation:
Trifocal.

	Trifocals have three different lenses.  Bifocals have two.  Unifocals are those single pieces of glass attached to chains that are only held up by the eye itself.

questions.text: TRI + to throw wildly, or a school dance = wasting time
TRI + a pea capsule = camera stand
TRI + put a little ____ into it, or what one says when they hit the ground after falling = Victory
TRI + small container for liquids = insignificant
TRI + edible food grain = type of hat
questions.explanation:
Tricorn.

	A tricorn is a hat where the brim is folded upward in three places.
